definition: to grasp/to hold/to operate/to manage/to control/to steer/to exercise/to drill (practice)/to play/to speak (a language)
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: The labeler shall operate with a minimum of operator involvement.
sentences.chinese: 贴标签机应当在最少的操作员介入条件下运行。

sentences.english: While serving as a supply tug operator on Fondor, Shire also was a thief.
sentences.chinese: 希雷既是方多的补给拖船操作员，也是一个偷船贼。

sentences.english: The boom operator still lays face-down in the center of the aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 飞杆操作员依然是脸朝下俯卧在机身中间。

sentences.english: The crew consists of a pilot and weapon system operator.
sentences.chinese: 机组人员由一个飞行员和武器系统操作员。

sentences.english: Gravity meters and their operators were lowered to the water bottom in diving bells.
sentences.chinese: 重力仪及操作员们都在钟形潜水器内沉到水底。

sentences.english: Lyell ears attached to said operator.
sentences.chinese: 莱尔附在操作员的耳边说。

sentences.english: Texture artist, brf editor, and rigger.
sentences.chinese: 纹理艺术家，黑米皮编辑器，操作员。

sentences.english: Once all old stock is used, the Sequencing or Line Replenishment Operator will commence using breakpoint material.
sentences.chinese: 排序或线路补给操作员要开始着手使用转效点材料。

sentences.english: The device can be used in double-blind experiments, and also operated by individual operator.
sentences.chinese: 该装置可以用于在双盲实验，并也由单个操作员操作。

sentences.english: Is a system in place to certify & re-certify operators?
sentences.chinese: 是否有系统来进行操作员的技能确认以及再确认？

sentences.english: Incoming inspection by operators is prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 禁止操作员执行进厂检验。

sentences.english: This calls out to the script operator the fact that a policy decision is captured here.
sentences.chinese: 这向脚本操作员表明，一个策略决策是在这里捕获的。

sentences.english: Frank: We have been asked to create a new training program for our new-hire machine operators.
sentences.chinese: 公司要求我们为新聘的机器操作员设计新的培训方案。

sentences.english: MADE either by the operator or automatically by the typesetting system.
sentences.chinese: 由操作员或由排字系统自动进行的分字或齐行决定。

sentences.english: Vince sent a silent prayer to the ship's drives and their Karbarran overseers .
sentences.chinese: 文斯默默的为飞船的那些引擎和卡巴拉操作员祈祷。

sentences.english: Are they policewomen or keyboard operators?
sentences.chinese: 她们是女警察还是键盘操作员？

pinyin: kong1 zhong1 jiao1 tong1 guan3 zhi4 yuan2

definition: ground control (of airborne or space operation)
